mapper.select: select l.label_id as labelId, l.label_name as labelName, l.create_time as createTime, l.update_time as updateTime, l.version as version, l.del_flag as delFlag from label_question as lq left join label as l on l.label_id = lq.label_id where lq.del_flag = 0 and l.del_flag = 0 and l.label_name like concat('%', #{labelName}, '%') order by lq.create_time
